products.title: Almond & Vanilla Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: The almond wooden blind with vanilla tapes is a heartwarming number, offering a touch of neutral colour that lightly shades the home. The two textures look effortless amongst one another, bringing a sense of harmony between hard and soft surfaces in the room.

products.title: Ultra White & Soft White - 50mm Slat
products.description: Give your home a stylish and traditional feel with this gorgeous ultra white & soft white wooden blind with tapes. The crisp colouring of the slats is further accentuated by the addition of tapes, creating a subtle contrast that will give your home a timeless and rustic finish.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Silk White - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of verdi (blackout) silk white is the way in which it sits there ever so luxurious, and yet it remains neutral at the same time. It's a hard balance to strike, but when you see it you'll wonder why you never thought of it before. Taking your decor in a luxury direction is what we all dream of, so why wait any longer? A black leather couch and a large rug under the coffee table would be ideal ways to take the living room where you want to go.

products.description: Less really is more with their elodie classic white roman blind. The simplicity of the white blind will give your interior the justice it deserves. It will look beautiful placed in your home, oozing both sophistication and modernity. Place the blind in a cosy living room less really is more with their elodie classic white roman blind.

products.title: Quincy Vanilla Roman Blind
products.description: Sometimes all you need to create the perfect space is a soft and simple window dressing. This quincy vanilla fabric is exactly that - soft, simple and delightful. It's a creamy colour to keep the room warm and open with little flecks to add some designer texture. Your pick of lin sometimes all you need to create the perfect space is a soft and simple window dressing.

products.title: Versailles Snowdrop Roman Blind
products.description: Full of texture and grace, this versailles snowdrop roman blind takes the beauty of weave to another level. Its jacquard surface has a lovely satin finish, offering sheen to your windows. The colour is sweet too, a lovely shade of white. It's not quite ice, yet cool enough to dr full of texture and grace, this versailles snowdrop roman blind takes the beauty of weave to another level.

products.title: Arcus Snow Roman Blind
products.description: With the look of a wonderful rustic linen, and incredible texture the whole way through, this arcus snow roman blind is simple yet full of charm. The light, soft ivory colourway is speckled with warmer slubs, creating a sumptuous, warm yet refreshing look for your windows.

products.title: Verbier Voile Snow Roman Blind
products.description: This verbier voile snow is a beautifully serene offering, with subtle stripes and heavenly slubs. Its the perfect addition to a period property. Its cotton white colourway will let the natural light ooze into your home, whilst giving it an air of sophistication and privacy to this verbier voile snow is a beautifully serene offering, with subtle stripes and heavenly slubs.

products.title: Quintessence Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Perfect for adding a rich texture to a primarily neutral room, this lovely quintessence linen roman blind will add a subtle depth to your windows whilst delivering big on style. The gorgeous fabric is both bright and fresh, guaranteed to add an airy effect in your room whilst perfect for adding a rich texture to a primarily neutral room, this lovely quintessence linen roman blind will add a subtle depth to your windows whilst delivering big on style.

products.title: Rockhampton Satin White Roman Blind
products.description: Dazzle yourself with the sparkling sensation of the rockhampton satin white roman blind. With a contemporary pattern in a classic shade, this blind will have your home gleaming with pristine beauty all day and night. Use this base of white to brighten almost any colour scheme, dazzle yourself with the sparkling sensation of the rockhampton satin white roman blind.

products.description: Add a bit of lustre to your life with this fabulous glimmer frost roman blind. products.title: Mayfair, White - Roman Blind
products.description: Simply toned, this time with fresh white, the mayfair is a combination of deluxe silky threads and sumptuous cotton, creating a sheer and shimmering blind with elegant finesse, whilst sewn-in batons within each fold encourage a graceful fall and prevent the layers from sagging. Generate a luxurious effect by adorning the white with contrasting textures and intense colours, both to frame the silky blind and to add depth and personality.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), White - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Sacramento Bright White Vertical Blind
products.description: This white vertical blind features ribbons of woven-like texture giving the blind a mellow look and when the textured pattern catches the light it really adds something to the rooms style. Made from pvc the vanes are rigid and require no bottom chains, so simple and stylish this white vertical blind features ribbons of woven-like texture giving the blind a mellow look and when the textured pattern catches the light it really adds something to the rooms style.

products.title: Luna Softshade Pure White Day And Night Blind
products.description: Brighten up your windows with this smart and versatile day and night roller blind. The luna softshade pure white day and night roller blind boasts an adjustable design that is great for bringing calm and seclusion to any space whilst allowing plenty of natural light to filter through. Made using strips of white polyester and voile fabric, this versatile blind is ideal for downstairs, street facing rooms.

products.title: Vision White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This vision white perfect fit blind really is a vision. The bright white slats aren't just stylish and perfect for open spaces, they also have tiny little holes to allow the sunlight to softly filter through. The perfect fit frame creates an integrated look with seamless edges. It' this vision white perfect fit blind really is a vision.

products.title: Vision White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This beautiful neutral white blind features tiny perforations that allow small specks of light to softly filter through. The effect is to maximise natural light while preventing glare to create a cool and relaxing environment. The pure white blind will match elegantly with t this beautiful neutral white blind features tiny perforations that allow small specks of light to softly filter through.
